title: New: BANKS – Before I Ever Met You (SOHN RMX)
content:
Hot on the back of SOHN‘s rather beautiful remix of the Laura Mvula track, Green Garden, Vienna//London based producer/songwriter has now set his sights on the much hyped artists BANKS.

Much like the former track, Before I Ever Met You is a slow burner that slowly morphs into something pulsating and sinisterly aggravated. Hopefully this influx of remixes means we’ll be treated to some original material soon.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
